S06n576:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃścaratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ,
S06n576:3: bhagavānāha-iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti pratyavekṣitavyam |
S06n576:6: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyamavikṣiptayā cittasaṃtatyā yathā pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpamiti tāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na samanupaśyet |
S06n576:7: tāṃ ca asamanupaśyan dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkuryādbhūtakoṭim |
S06n576:8: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yadbhagavānevamāha-na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā sākṣātkartavyeti |
S06n576:9: kathaṃ bhagavan tasmin samādhau sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
S06n576:10: bhagavānāha-yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06n576:16: asamāhita evārambaṇe cittamupanibadhnāti-prajñāpāramitā ca me parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati,
S06n576:18: atrāntarā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣairdharmaiḥ,
S06n576:21: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06n576:22: tasmin samaye bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ānimittena ca samādhinā vihartavyam,
S06n576:27: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti |
S06n576:28: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ paramaśūraśca bhavet,
S06n576:47: supariniṣpannatayā sarveṣveva ca śilpasthāneṣu paramagatiko bhavet,
S06n576:65: tena mahālābhena samanvāgataḥ san bahujanaṃ saṃvibhajet,
S06n576:70: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣastatonidānaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet,
S06n576:75: bhagavānāha-sa khalu punaḥ subhūte puruṣastayā mahāsaṃpattyā samanvāgato mātāpitṛputradārān gṛhītvā kenacideva kāraṇasāmagrīyogena mahāṭavīkāntāraṃ pratipanno bhavet mahāpratibhayaṃ bālānāṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam |
S06n576:80: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte aṭavīkāntāre tasya puruṣasya bahavaḥ pratyarthikāḥ bahavaḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ |
S06n576:81: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa śūraḥ puruṣastaiḥ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairabhyutthitairavinivartyo dṛḍhavīryabalasamanvāgataḥ prajñāvānatisnigdhaḥ sānukrośo dhīro mahāsaṃbhārasamanvāgatastān mātāpitṛputradārān parityajya tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārādātmānamekamapakrāmayitavyaṃ manyeta?
S06n576:86: tasya tatra aṭavīkāntāre bahutarakāśca śūratarakarāśca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarakarāśca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāmanye udāratarakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāstiṣṭhanti rakṣanti |
S06n576:87: te tasya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā avatāraprekṣiṇo'vatāragaveṣiṇo'vatāraṃ na lapsyante |
S06n576:88: tena sa bhagavan pratibalaḥ puruṣo'kṣato'nupahatastanmātāpitṛputradāramātmānaṃ ca tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārācchaktaḥ kṣemeṇa svastinā śīghramapakrāmayituṃ yāvadgrāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā anuprāptaḥ syāt ||
S06n576:89: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvahitānukampī maitrīvihārī karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī upekṣāvihārī upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ kuśalamūlāni samyagbuddhānujñātayā pariṇāmanayā pariṇāmya kiṃcāpi śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca samādhivimokṣamukhānyavatarati,
S06n576:96: tenaiṣa pratibalaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
S06n576:97: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike maitrīcittamārambaṇīkṛtya tān paramayā maitryā paribadhnāti,
S06n576:98: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kleśapakṣaṃ mārapakṣaṃ cātikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya tatra samādhāvavatiṣṭhate |
S06n576:99: aprāptaśca sa subhūte āsravakṣayaṃ paramapāramitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti |
S06n576:100: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06n576:101: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cedānīṃ nānimittena samādhinā viharati |
S06n576:102: na cānena ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ sākṣātkṛto bhavati |
S06n576:103: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunirākāśe'ntarīkṣe carati,
S06n576:107: na ca tatrāpi niśrito na pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
S06n576:108: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāvihāreṇa viharati,
S06n576:114: na ca śūnyatāyāṃ vā ānimitte vā apraṇihite vā patatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ |
S06n576:115: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavāniṣvastrācārya iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ supariniṣṭhitaḥ |
S06n576:117: ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍaistatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patat pratinivārayet,
S06n576:119: tasya paurvakasya kāṇḍasya kāṇḍaparaṃparayā bhūmau patanaṃ na dadyāt,
S06n576:122: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ tāvattāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti,
S06n576:123: yāvanna tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni suparipakvāni |
S06n576:124: yadā tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni bhavanti suparipakvāni,
S06n576:126: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evameteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gambhīradharmatā pratyavekṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā,
S06n576:138: paramaduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06n576:143: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ |
S06n576:144: tasyeme evaṃrūpāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣā bhavanti-mayaite sarvasattvāḥ parimocayitavyā iti |
S06n576:145: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittamabhinirharati-sarvasattvā mamāparityaktāḥ,
S06n576:150: tadā upāyakauśalyasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ-nāyamantarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ |
S06n576:153: sa caivāsya cittotpādo yattasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ |
S06n576:154: sa evamanena cittotpādenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti ||
S06n576:155: punaraparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣate,
S06n576:159: tenaivaṃ cittamabhinirhartavyam-dīrgharātramamī sattvāḥ sattvasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti |
S06n576:167: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nena cittotpādena anena copāyakauśalyena samanvāgato nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06n576:168: na ca parihīyate maitrīsamādhito na karuṇāmuditopekṣāsamādhitaḥ |
S06n576:170: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śuklairdharmaiḥ |
S06n576:173: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati-dīrgharātramamī sattvā dharmasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti |
S06n576:175: so'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate |
S06n576:179: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ |
S06n576:182: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati-dīrgharātramamī sattvā nimittasaṃjñayā nimitte caranti |
S06n576:183: teṣāṃ nimittasaṃjñāprahāṇāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti |
S06n576:184: sa ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ |
S06n576:185: so'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate,
S06n576:187: na ca parihīyate maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ sarvasamādhitaḥ |
S06n576:189: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ |
S06n576:192: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati-dīrgharātramamī sattvā nityasaṃjñayā sukhasaṃjñayā ātmasaṃjñayā śubhasaṃjñayā ca viparyastāḥ |
S06n576:193: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya nityasaṃjñāyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ ātmasaṃjñāyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā viparyāsasya prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi-anityametatsarvaṃ na nityamiti |
S06n576:197: so'nena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti aparipūrṇeṣu buddhadharmeṣu |
S06n576:200: na ca parihīyate maitrīto vā karuṇāto vā muditāto vā upekṣāto vā |
S06n576:202: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ |
S06n576:205: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ cittotpādamutpādayati,
S06n576:206: ityapīme sattvā dīrgharātramupalambhe caritāvinaḥ etarhyupalambhe caranti |
S06n576:212: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaiṣāmete doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n576:215: evaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nena smṛtisamanvāhāreṇa anena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ evameteṣāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śūnyatāto vā ānimittato vā apraṇihitato vā anabhisaṃskārato vā anutpādato vā ajātito vā abhāvato vā |
S06n576:217: yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jñānasamanvāgato'nabhisaṃskāre vā patet,
S06n576:220: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripraṣṭavyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena-katameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06n576:222: yāni cittānyabhinirharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śūnyatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06n576:230: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākaroti-śūnyataiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavyā |
S06n576:231: ānimittameva apraṇihitameva anabhisaṃskāra eva anutpāda eva ajātireva abhāva eva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavya iti |
S06n576:234: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ |
S06n576:245: subhūtirāha-syātpunarbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo bhavet?
S06n576:246: bhagavānāha-syātsubhūte sa paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīyo bhavet |
S06n576:247: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā aśrutvā va evaṃ pratipadyeta,
S06n576:249: subhūtirāha-tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhāya caranti |
S06n576:251: bhagavānāha-tathā hi subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau |
S06n576:254: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā uttaptāvaropitakuśalamūlā veditavyāḥ |
S06n576:255: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena |
S06n576:256: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato'pi svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti vyavalokayati,
S06n576:258: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n576:259: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato'pi śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā traidhātukāya ca spṛhāmanuśaṃsācittaṃ notpādayati,
S06n576:260: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n576:261: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato'pyanekaśatāyāḥ parṣado'nekasahasrāyā yāvadanekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāyāḥ parṣado madhyagataṃ maṇḍalamāle niṣaṇṇaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ paśyati |
S06n576:262: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n576:263: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato'pi vaihāyasamabhyudgamya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06n576:266: ye'nyāsu dikṣu gatvā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti,
S06n576:268: evamapi subhūte svapnāntaragatoa'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃjānīte |
S06n576:269: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n576:270: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo notrasyati,
S06n576:273: grāmaghāte vā nagaraghāte vā nigamaghāte vā janapadaghāte vā rāṣṭraghāte vā agnidāhe vā vartamāne vyālamṛgān vā tato'nyānapi vā kṣudramṛgajātīn dṛṣṭvā śiraśchede vā pratyupasthite tato'nyānyapi vā mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhadaurmanasyāni vā prāpya tato'nyeṣāmapi vā sattvānāṃ mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā nāsya bhayabhairavamutpadyate,
S06n576:275: tataśca svapnāntarātprativibuddhasya samanantaravyutthitasyaivaṃ bhavati-svapnopamamidaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukam |
S06n576:276: evaṃ ca mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samyagdeśayatā dharmo deśayitavya iti |
S06n576:277: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n576:278: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasya nairayikān sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati-tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti |
S06n576:279: idamapi subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n576:280: tatra subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyeta asyāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti?
S06n576:281: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato'pi nirayagatāṃstiryakpretagatān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhate |
S06n576:282: sa tāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhya evaṃ cintayati-tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti |
S06n576:283: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam |
S06n576:284: idamapi subhūte avivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S06n576:285: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nagaradāhe vā grāmadāhe vā vartamāne prativibuddhaḥ saṃstataḥ svapnādevaṃ samanvāharati yathā-mayā svapnāntaragatena ye ākārāḥ yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni dṛṣṭāni,
S06n576:287: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni mama saṃvidyante |
S06n576:288: etena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ nagaradāho vā grāmadāho vā vartamāna upaśāmyatu,
S06n576:291: sacetsubhūte grāmadāho vā nagaradāho vā upaśāmyati,
S06n576:294: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairavinivartanīyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti |
S06n576:298: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti |
S06n576:299: sacetpunaḥ subhūte so'gnidāho'tikramya gṛhādgṛhaṃ rathyāyā rathyāmanyatarānyatarāṃ rathyāṃ vā gṛhaṃ vā gacchati,
S06n576:304: veditavyametatsubhūte dharmapratyākhyānaṃ duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena karmopacitam |
S06n576:307: ityayaṃ subhūte heturayaṃ pratyayo'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇatāyā iti |
S06n576:315: bhagavānetadavocat-sacetsubhūte kaścideva puruṣo vā strī vā dārako vā dārikā vā amanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto bhavedāviṣṭaḥ |
S06n576:316: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upasaṃkramya evamadhiṣṭhānaṃ samanvāhartavyam |
S06n576:325: ye'pi te aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n576:326: na teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā asākṣātkṛtaṃ vā anabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā |
S06n576:327: yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanto mamādhyāśayam-ityapyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti |
S06n576:328: anena satyena satyavacanena iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā yena amanuṣyagraheṇa gṛhīto vā āviṣṭo vā,
S06n576:330: sacetso'manuṣyaḥ evaṃ bhāṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpakrāmati,
S06n576:331: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti |
S06n576:332: sacetpunaḥ subhūte evaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya so'manuṣyo'pakrāmati,
S06n576:333: vediṃtavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti ||
